description:
CHANGELOG : V1.3.8 Fixed movie poster size

Application to search movie showings near you. 

* Uses location services (GPS, GSM, Wifi) 
* Adds showings to your calendar
* Lets you invite friends either by SMS or E-Mail 
* Locates a theater 
* Gets movie information, search trailers 
* More... 

Supported countries : Northern Ireland, Argentina, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Colombia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, India, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Malaysia (administrative), Malaysia (official), Marshall Islands, Netherlands (official), Netherlands Antilles, New Zealand, Norway, People’s Republic of China [b], Poland, Portugal, Republic of China (Taiwan), Russia, Saint Helena, Scotland, Singapore, Slovakia, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Turkey, United Kingdom, England, United States, Wales. 

If you encounter a problem, please contact me before rating my app. Thanks.
